Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a pottery vessel, the fabric is brown in section and the exterior is covered with a patchy dark brown slip, over which are traces on a single line of black-painted hieratic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393751) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393751)
